lead_paragraph: Monica Abbott signed a $1 million contract with the newest National Pro Fastpitch franchise in May, a sign that the league is ready to grow. But to do so, it may need corporate sponsors.

headline.print_headline: With a Million-Dollar Arm, a League Makes Its Pitch
headline.main: With a Million-Dollar Arm, a Softball League Makes Its Pitch

snippet: Monica Abbott signed a $1 million contract with the newest National Pro Fastpitch franchise in May, a sign that the league is ready to grow. But to do so, it may need corporate sponsors....
abstract: Houston-based Scrap Yard Dawgs of National Pro Fastpitch league sign Olympic softball silver medalist pitcher Monica Abbott to six-year, $1 million contract; struggling league is trying to balance sustainability with attracting top players.
